abstract_summ: SARS-CoV-2 is the cause of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) which recently has been characterized as a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) Having killed almost 250,000 people worldwide as of May 4th 2020 . Cardiovascular disease represents a prevalent underlying comorbidity associated with increased mortality rates among affected individuals . In this context, special attention should be given towards patients with concurrent cardiovascular diseases .
